activities: EU employee information will be stored in our Global Human Resource Information System for internal tracking and reporting purposes only.  Employee information stored in the system will not be transferred to any 3rd parties in the U.S.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, France, Germany, Netherlands, Sweden, United Kingdom
recoursemech: AMX has a internal dispute resolution process which is defined in our Data Privacy Policy.  AMX is committed to cooperate with the EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) to resolve any complaints that cannot be resolved internally.
